## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New rule or scanner (adds detection capability)
- [ ] Feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing behaviour to change)
- [ ] Documentation / chore

## Checklist

- [ ] `just ci` passes locally (fmt-check + clippy + tests)
- [ ] New or modified rules have a unit test covering both a match **and** a non-match case
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `[Unreleased]`
- [ ] `README.md` rule table updated (if adding/changing a rule)
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets, internal URLs, or personal information introduced
